alert.note: Alert for Benewah; Bonner; Boundary; Kootenai; Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued August 19 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: An Air Quality Alert has been issued by the following agencies: Idaho Department of Environmental Quality in Coeur d`Alene Coeur d`Alene Tribe * WHAT: Air Quality Advisory because of degraded air quality. * WHERE: Benewah, Bonner, Boundary, Kootenai, and Shoshone counties * WHEN: Until 10:00 AM PDT Monday August 21, 2023. * IMPACTS: At 4 PM PDT Saturday, several air quality sensors in Boundary, Bonner, and Kootenai counties were reporting very unhealthy to hazardous air quality. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONSâ€¦ Air pollutants can cause breathing difficulties for children, the elderly, as well as persons with respiratory problems. Those individuals who are sensitive to increased particulate matter or smoke are encouraged to avoid prolonged or strenuous outdoor activity during this advisory. Open burning is prohibited by air quality rule. It is also recommended that all other individuals limit prolonged or strenuous activity outdoors. When Air Quality is hazardous, everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors. THIS STATEMENT IS ISSUED BY THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY, AIR QUALITY GROUP. FOR MORE INFORMATION, CONTACT DEQ`s Coeur d`Alene Regional Office at (208) 769-1422.
